item.description:
Come down to Edgewood Yacht Club and watch the fourth Pre-Season Patriot's game - Patriots vs New York Giants!

Game time is 7:00pm. Bring a dish to share and the bar will be open!

Please keep in mind this is a private yacht club and an invitation has been extended to P-Collective members to enjoy this and future Pat's games in the Darby Room this season. All are welcome, and please tell them you are with the Providence Collective!

I will try and post these as reminders, but can't make all the games. Bob Natale or Sue Toland will be at the club hosting the events. Also, if there is another sporting event you would like to see, please let me know!

How cool is it to be on the water and watching a Patriots game with friends!

Hope to see you there!

Please RSVP so others who want to go will know you're going, and so I know whether people want to go!
item.how_to_find_us: Sue Toland or Bob Natale is hosting this event. Please say you're with the Providence Collective!
item.name: NE Patriots Pre-Season Game at EYC - Patriots vs New York Giants!
